fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to choose two players and learn the amount of days between their post date.
- Use 2 bees to give a random attribute from your first target to your second.
- Use 3 bees to handicap a player. All abilities that they attempt to use which have an outcome that directly harm the town will fail until the beginning of the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night.
- You can use 2 abilities per night.
- If you are converted by the Unseen, you become Black Rose Beekeeper (3112).
